CustomField.description: CodeScan usually limits the LOC usage to 40,000 times the number of blocks purchased, but sometimes a special product sold or use of another product causes us to allow more. If this field is populated, an overage is allowed for the reason listed.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: CodeScan usually limits the LOC usage to 40,000 times the number of blocks purchased, but sometimes a special product sold or use of another product causes us to allow more. If this field is populated, an overage is allowed for the reason listed.
CustomField.label: CodeScan LOC Overage Allowed Reason
